content: **burstling pot holder** is a very simple project for people who want to learn how to change colors in crochet weave in ends and need to add a bustling touch to the kitchen to fill it with laughter and chatter **skill level ** easy photo tutorial will follow you through all the pattern **measurements** 12 5 cm 4 9 inches wide and 12 5 cm 4 9 inches long it is a square you can make a bigger or smaller version of the pot holder by adding or subtracting stitches from the starting chain **materials ** -yarn phildar phil coton mimi in color golf ca cedre cb safran cc and ananas cd 100% cotton oeko-tex the total amount of yarn used is 20 g 0 7 oz / 49 m 53 5 yards -2 5 mm c/2 crochet hook -tapestry needle -measuring tape -stitch markers
